history.proof: intros n m p H. qsimpl use: lt_le_trans,N. qsimpl use: lt_le_trans,N,Nmult_lt_compat_l. qsimpl use: lt_le_trans,N,Nmult_lt_compat_l. qsimpl use: lt_le_trans,N,Nmult_lt_compat_l. qsimpl use: lt_le_trans,N,Nmult_lt_compat_l. hecrush use: N.mul_comm, N.eq_0_gt_0_cases, N.neq_0_lt_0, N.mul_lt_mono_pos_l, N.mul_0_r unfold: N.lt.

exceptions.tactic: apply (N.lt_le_trans (N.mul p n) (N.mul p m) n).
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : N H : p * n < p * m Unable to unify "p * n < n" with "n < m".

In environment H0 : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n < p)%nat n, m, p : N H2 : (p * n ?= p * m) = Lt Unable to unify "(?M1859 * ?M1857 ?= ?M1859 * ?M1858) = Lt" with "(n ?= m) = Lt".

In environment H1 : forall n m p : N, n < m -> 0 < p -> p * n < p * m H : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n < p)%nat n, m, p : N H2 : (p * n ?= p * m) = Lt Unable to unify "(S ?M2233 <= ?M2235)%nat" with "(n ?= m) = Lt".

In environment H3 : forall n m p : N, n < m -> 0 < p -> p * n < p * m H0 : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n < p)%nat n, m, p : N H2 : (p * n ?= p * m) = Lt Unable to unify "1 < p" with "n < m".

In environment H1 : forall n m p : N, n < m -> 0 < p -> p * n < p * m H : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n < p)%nat n, m, p : N H2 : (p * n ?= p * m) = Lt Unable to unify "(S ?M2985 <= ?M2987)%nat" with "(n ?= m) = Lt".

exceptions.tactic: apply N.lt_transitive with (m := N.mul p m); auto.
exceptions.exn: The reference N.lt_transitive was not found in the current environment.

original: intros n m p H. apply (N.lt_le_trans (N.mul p n) (N.mul p m) n). apply Nmult_lt_compat_l. - apply H. - apply (N.lt_1_l' n m p). + apply H. + apply N.lt_transitive with (m := N.mul p m); auto.
